alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 05 at 12:46PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...NARROW BANDS OF ACCUMULATING SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OTSEGO...CHENANGO...CORTLAND...AND DELAWARE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Narrow bands of snow which can rapidly reduce visibility below a mile. A quick additional half inch to one inch of fluffy accumulation is possible through 2 PM, causing slick roads. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1243 PM EST, narrow bands of snow were moving southeast at 30 MPH across the area. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Oneonta, Norwich, Sidney, Guilford, Plymouth, North Norwich, Meredith, Oxford, Bainbridge and Masonville. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 88 between 8 and 12. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
